events.title: the band Warsaw, soon to be renamed to Joy Division, forms

movie.title: Control
movie.plot: Control is the biography of Joy Division lead singer Ian Curtis, taking his story from schoolboy days of 1973 to his suicide on the eve of the band's first American tour in 1980.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 31 wins & 34 nominations.

events.title: Deepak Ahluwalia dies of his injuries

movie.title: Provoked: A True Story
movie.plot: Provoked is the true story of Kiranjit Ahluwalia, a Punjabi woman who moved to London after her marriage with Deepak Ahluwalia. Her husband seemed caring at first but then began to beat her up. He started drinking a lot and sleeping around with other women. he also subjected her to spousal rape. After ten years and having two children with him, out of fear, she sets him on fire.

events.title: the friends, apart from Linus, watch The Phantom Menace on its opening day

movie.title: Fanboys
movie.plot: In 1999, Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of The Phantom Menace before its release.

movie.title: Avatar
movie.plot: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.
